languages.text: "Значимость статусных проявлений переоценена мирянами. Статус проявляется в функциональном превосходстве, а не ценности имущества".
"Laypeople always overvalue indications of status. Prestige is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the quantification of one's possessions."
languages.original_text: "Значимость статусных проявлений переоценена мирянами. Статус проявляется в функциональном превосходстве, а не ценности имущества".

traits.locale_text: "Laypeople overvalue indications of status. Status is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the total worth of one's possessions."
"Laypeople overvalue indications of status. Status is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the total worth of one's possessions."
"Laypeople always overvalue indications of status. Prestige is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the quantification of one's possessions."
"Laypeople always overvalue indications of status. Prestige is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the quantification of one's possessions."
"Laypeople always overvalue indications of status. Prestige is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the quantification of one's possessions."
"Laypeople always overvalue indications of status. Prestige is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the quantification of one's possessions."
"Laypeople always overvalue indications of status. Prestige is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the quantification of one's possessions."

languages.text: "Laien bewerten Statussymbole immer über. Prestige wird durch funktionale Überlegenheit demonstriert, nicht durch die Quantifizierung des persönlichen Besitzes."
languages.original_text: "Laypeople always overvalue indications of status. Prestige is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the quantification of one's possessions."

traits.locale_text: "Laien bewerten Statussymbole immer über. Prestige wird durch funktionale Überlegenheit demonstriert, nicht durch die Quantifizierung des persönlichen Besitzes."

languages.text: « Les profanes surestiment toujours les signes extérieurs de prestige. En réalité, celui-ci s'exprime à travers notre supériorité fonctionnelle, et non pas par l'accumulation de richesses. »
languages.original_text: "Laypeople always overvalue indications of status. Prestige is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the quantification of one's possessions."

traits.locale_text: « Les profanes surestiment toujours les signes extérieurs de prestige. En réalité, celui-ci s'exprime à travers notre supériorité fonctionnelle, et non pas par l'accumulation de richesses. »

languages.text: «Los laicos siempre sobrevaloran las indicaciones de estatus. El prestigio se demuestra mediante superioridad funcional, no mediante la cuantía de las posesiones».
languages.original_text: "Laypeople always overvalue indications of status. Prestige is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the quantification of one's possessions."

traits.locale_text: «Los laicos siempre sobrevaloran las indicaciones de estatus. El prestigio se demuestra mediante superioridad funcional, no mediante la cuantía de las posesiones».

languages.text: 「素人は常にステータスを重視しすぎる。名声は機能的な優位性によって示されるものであり、所有物の数値化によって示されるものではない」
languages.original_text: "Laypeople always overvalue indications of status. Prestige is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the quantification of one's possessions."

traits.locale_text: 「素人は常にステータスを重視しすぎる。名声は機能的な優位性によって示されるものであり、所有物の数値化によって示されるものではない」

languages.text: “教外人士总是会高估地位的象征。威望是通过功能方面的优势来体现的，不是通过财富的量化来体现的。”
languages.original_text: "Laypeople always overvalue indications of status. Prestige is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the quantification of one's possessions."

traits.locale_text: “教外人士总是会高估地位的象征。威望是通过功能方面的优势来体现的，不是通过财富的量化来体现的。”

languages.original_text: "Laypeople always overvalue indications of status. Prestige is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the quantification of one's possessions."

languages.text: "Avam tabakası, durumlarına dair bulgulara her zaman aşırı değer biçer. İtibar, işlevsel üstünlük aracılığıyla kanıtlanır. Birinin sahip olduğu ögelerin miktarıyla kanıtlanmaz."
languages.original_text: "Laypeople always overvalue indications of status. Prestige is demonstrated through functional superiority, not the quantification of one's possessions."
